Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content: everyone Please update your KMDICE nodes to the latest FSM branch of komodo! A hard fork change has been done to the chain and everyone needs to update and be sure you keep on the right fork. If you hold your funds in Agama wallet, please dont use them until we have cleared all the tests and release a new version of Agama with fixed chain. Also if you were mining using a pool, be sure your pool is on the right fork, if not, encourage the owner to fix it or point your devices to a pool that is in the correct fork.
